de.payleven.payment

Interface DevicePreparationListener


  • public interface DevicePreparationListener
    Reacts on preparing a new device for payment.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDone(Device device)
      Called when device was successfully configured for payment.
      void onError(PaylevenError error)
      Called in case of the error during the preparation process

    • Method Detail

      • onDone

        void onDone(Device device)
        Called when device was successfully configured for payment. This guarantees that at the time the method is called, device is turned on and connected to the current android device.
        Parameters:
        device - Data of the prepared device

      • onError

        void onError(PaylevenError error)
        Called in case of the error during the preparation process
        Parameters:
        error - may be one of the following
        BluetoothError in case there is no bluetooth connection with the device
        NetworkError in case of no network or internet connection
        PaylevenError any other case. This is also a super class for other possible errors
